title: A Tropical Frontier: The Deep Blue Sea
description: [ This book completes the tale of Charlie MacLeod and Jubal Prescott and is not intended for fledgling, unseasoned readers of the series, A Tropical Frontier]In the Twelfth book in the award-winning "Tropical Frontier" series, The Deep Blue Sea, we bid a bittersweet farewell to a Jolly Sailor and an old Indian Fighter.
author: Tim Robinson
